name: Hackathon Discord Manager
description: A Discord bot for managing communication and teams for an online hackathon

DISCORD_TOKEN.description: Discord token to authenticate with. This should be from your application under the Bot section in your Discord Developer Portal.

RUST_LOG.description: Minimum level to log to the console

TABLES_CATEGORY_ID.description: The ID of the channel category where you want the team channels to be put.

MENTORS_CHANNEL_ID.description: The ID of the channel where you want all mentor notifications to be send. This should be a channel accessible by mentors and administrators

REPORTS_CHANNEL_ID.description: The ID of the channel where you want all report notifications to be sent. This should be a channel only accessible by the administrator and moderators

BOT_ROLE_ID.description: The ID of the role for this bot. This role should be autogenerated by Discord. All category, channel, and role IDs can be obtained by right-clicking on the resource and clicking on "Copy ID".

TEAMLESS_ROLE_ID.description: The ID of the role for all users without a team. This includes those who are going solo.

MENTOR_ROLE_ID.description: The ID of the role for all mentors.

MANAGER_ROLE_ID.description: The ID of the role for all manager/administrator users.
